Header: New Major Generals Receive Commanderâ€™s Blessings
Content: Newly promoted four Majors General this morning (11) paid a joint courtesy call on the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake at the Army Headquarters. Those new rankers, Major General Chandana Gunawardana, Commandant, Officer Career Development Centre - Buttala, Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division, Major General Jayantha Gunarathna, General Officer Commanding, 55 Division, Major General Deepthi Jayatilake, General officer Commanding, 12 Division received warm greetings and best wishes of the Army Commander before interactive discussions set in. Before they ended the courtesy meeting, they added memories by sitting with the Commander for a group photo.
